communityDescription: GDG is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.

description.short: Dive deep into the latest trends and innovations through talks, workshops, and more. It's a day filled with learning, networking, and inspiring ideas
description.long: An annual event hosted by the Google Developers Group across the world to bring the technology closer to the developers. It is an all day developer conference where we aim to focus on multiple technologies through lightning talks, sessions, workshops, etc.An annual event hosted by the Google Developers Group across the world to bring the technology closer to the developers. It is an all day developer conference where we aim to focus on multiple technologies through lightning talks, sessions, workshops, etc.

whatToExpect.title: Hands-on Sessions
whatToExpect.description: Participate in interactive sessions where you can get hands-on experience with the latest Google technologies.

whatToExpect.title: Networking Opportunity
whatToExpect.description: Meet and connect with fellow developers, industry leaders, and Google experts to expand your professional network.

whatToExpect.title: Workshops
whatToExpect.description: Join interactive workshops to learn new skills and technologies with hands-on guidance from experts.

whatToExpect.title: Keynote Speeches
whatToExpect.description: Be inspired by keynote speeches from industry leaders and Google experts, sharing insights and future trends.

whatToExpect.title: Panel Discussions
whatToExpect.description: Engage in thought-provoking panel discussions on the latest trends and techs, featuring experts from various fields.
